channel.title: Get More Downloads- read =)
channel.description:
Hi :) (read below to see the servers with known viruses) I will scan anyones server download so you can prove to everyone there is no virus :)
Choose a package: (lol)
A. I would like for you to scan my server, and provide pictures of your scan.
B. I would like for you to scan this server, before I download, provide pictures.
Everything is free, just use the form below, and post.
Hopefully a moderator wont be to strict and remove this.. please no one flame, just trying to help :(
----------- Package: Link to server you want scanned: Owner of server: -----------
Known infected downloads:
N/A
Known clean downloads:
N/A

item.title: Get More Downloads- read =)
item.dc:creator: @Keatrm Keatrm
item.description:
@Keatrm wrote:

Lol ok ok, moderators, can you please move this to the proper topic? Preferably not the “none” topic =P

item.title: Get More Downloads- read =)
item.dc:creator: @wetodded wetodded
item.description:
@wetodded wrote:

I really understand that you’re trying to help the people here by this. This is a cool idea, however, I suggest posting this in a different section. Also, please read the rules to understand what is and isn’t allowed in “Server downloads”.

Read full topic

item.title: Get More Downloads- read =)
item.dc:creator: @Keatrm Keatrm
item.description:
@Keatrm wrote:

Well, the title is “Server Downloads” that means it will contain post about server download.
Looks to me like this involves server downloads…

Read full topic

item.title: Get More Downloads- read =)
item.dc:creator: @wetodded wetodded
item.description:
@wetodded wrote:

I understand what you are trying to do. However, this section of the forums is called “Server Downloads”. This isn’t a server download, and this is an advertisement to a service that you are offering. Please search around the forums and find a more appropriate section to post in.

Read full topic
